titleStmt.title: A position against vainglorious, and that which is falsly called learned preaching
titleStmt.author: Jacob, Henry, 1563-1624.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: H.I. [i.e. Henry Jacob].
Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Running title reads: Against ostentation in preaching.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
